top_dishes.description: Rich, creamy pork bone broth simmered for 12 hours with chashu and soft-boiled egg
Bold fermented soybean broth with a fiery chili kick and ground pork
Crispy Japanese-style fried chicken, perfectly seasoned and juicy inside
Handmade pork and cabbage dumplings with a crispy golden bottom
Creamy green tea ice cream — a refreshing finish to a hearty bowl

ai_summary.vibe: A cozy, no-frills ramen shop with communal seating and steamy bowls served fast.
practical_tips: Expect a 15-20 minute wait during weekend lunch rush
Cash and card accepted, no reservations — first come first served
Street parking is limited; consider transit (Main St-Science World Station nearby)
